welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Stonegate, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities! Known for its historic architecture and charming main street, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport, catering to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal building, named after aviation pioneer Elrey Borge Jeppesen.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: One of the three concourses at Denver International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jeffco Airport handles all commercial flights and passenger services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Jeffco Airport is used for private and corporate flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Jeffco Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
